summary: An email from defense attorney Martin G. Weinberg to Reid Weingarten regarding a preservation request made by Epstein's defense team in the SDNY case. Weinberg inquires whether Weingarten will notify other relevant parties, such as ND Ga prosecutors in the CVRA case, about the request to preserve communications related to Epstein.

persons.name: Martin G. Weinberg
persons.context: Author of the email, inquiring about notifying other parties regarding a preservation request made by Epstein's defense team in the SDNY case.

persons.name: Reid Weingarten
persons.context: Recipient of the email, being asked whether he will advise other relevant parties about the defense's preservation request.

connections.description: Weinberg is emailing Weingarten to coordinate legal strategy regarding notifying other parties about a preservation request.

events.title: Preservation Request Coordination
events.description: Martin G. Weinberg emails Reid Weingarten to inquire about notifying other relevant legal parties (ND Ga prosecutors in the CVRA case) that Epstein's defense in SDNY has made a preservation request for all communications related to Epstein.

keyFacts: Epstein's defense team in the SDNY case made a preservation request for all communications with SDNY, Main Justice, plaintiffs' lawyers, or their clients related to Epstein.
Martin G. Weinberg is coordinating with Reid Weingarten about whether to notify other relevant parties, specifically ND Ga prosecutors assigned to the CVRA case, about this preservation request.
The email is dated July 26, 2019, indicating ongoing legal maneuvering and coordination among defense attorneys after Epstein's arrest in the SDNY case.
